metadata.title: CVE-2013-7458 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
linenoise, as used in Redis before 3.2.3, uses world-readable permissionsfor .rediscli_history, which allows local users to obtain sensitiveinformation by reading the file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7458` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis - 5:4.0.9-1
redis-sentinel - 5:4.0.9-1
redis-server - 5:4.0.9-1
redis-tools - 5:4.0.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redis package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5:4.0.9-1').
